Luminar Neo by Skylum Software is an easy-to-use tool that helps you edit and enhance your images with ease! Within this exceptional bundle, you’ll gain access to a how-to-use course, the base software, expressive presets, and dynamic overlays—alongside standout add-ons like Tranquil Dawn Skies and City Lights. Picture-perfect edits at a price you’ll love. Plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Code.org.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Next-gen photo editing at your fingertips

Next-gen photo editing at your fingertips. Take your photos to the next level—introducing the Neon & Noir: Elite Photos with Luminar Neo Bundle. Luminar Neo by Skylum Software is an easy-to-use tool that helps you edit and enhance your images with ease! Within this exceptional bundle, you’ll gain access to a how-to-use course, the base software, expressive presets, and dynamic overlays—alongside standout add-ons like Tranquil Dawn Skies and City Lights. Picture-perfect edits at a price you’ll love. Plus, a portion of your purchase helps support Code.org.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $1,189. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem DRM-Free. All of the software in this bundle is available DRM-Free for Mac.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Code.org. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

overlays_smokeandfog.description_text: Easily create atmospheric images with these 10 Overlays in JPEG format that contain clouds, fog, and smoke effects of various intensity. Make sure to use them with Luminar Neo’s Layers and experiment with your photos in any genre. Add them to your landscapes, street photos, or even portraits to create a unique mood. You can conjure up an interesting smoke effect or make the subject stand out in new ways, all in just a few clicks. Why not try it out now?

overlays_expiredfilm.description_text: There’s something nostalgic about the look of film, the dreamy fadedness of it, the flares, the accidental light leaks. Celebrate those imperfections in your photos and bring back the magic of film with Expired Film Overlays created by Team Skylum. The Expired Overlays pack includes 12 Overlays that you can download and use in Luminar Neo.

luminarpresets_cinematicpartiii.description_text: The third part of this cinematic series is inspired by iconic TV shows. Make your photos look like they were shot in a variety of fantasy worlds, across space and time. Part III boasts 10 fantastic Templates/Presets for any type of image.

overlays_scratches.description_text: Add an edgy, old-fashioned, or worn-out feeling to your image with these 10 Overlays that depict all kinds of scratch marks. Whether you’re looking for scratches on plastic, marble, glass, wood, or some other material, you can definitely enhance your photos with a scratch Overlay from this collection.

luminarpresets_roadtripadventures.description_text: This collection of 10 road trip inspired Presets captures the essence of your journey, enriching your photos with cinematic tones, vibrant contrasts, and atmospheric vibes.

luts_colorpop.description_text: Introducing a set of 10 color-grading LUTs designed to subtly enhance the colors in your photos, adding a gentle color accent with a refined touch. Seamlessly transform your images by accentuating natural hues, revealing the beauty of each scene. This collection of LUTs allows you to create colorful compositions without overpowering the original essence. Ideal for a variety of photography styles—from serene landscapes and delicate portraits to vibrant street scenes and elegant still lifes—each of these 10 LUTs helps you craft captivating visuals with minimalistic color accents.

code_org.description_text:
Donations to support Code.org are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Launched in 2013, Code.org® is a non-profit dedicated to expanding participation in computer science by making it available in more schools, and increasing participation by women and underrepresented students of color. Code.org's comprehensive approach represents the vanguard of effective integration of Computer Science (CS) into the core of public school education. Our vision is that every student in every school should have the opportunity to learn computer science. We believe computer science and computer programming should be part of the core curriculum in education, alongside other science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) courses, such as biology, physics, chemistry and algebra.

overlays_timelessfilmframes.description_text: Transform your images into cinematic treasures with this exclusive pack of 10 unique Frame Overlays. Each overlay is crafted in a versatile format for seamless integration with Luminar Neo’s Layers feature. Whether you’re channeling the dramatic intensity of classic noir or the refined elegance of vintage cinematography, you’ll find the perfect overlay to enhance your photos and evoke powerful emotions.

skies_tranquildawnskies.description_text: Sometimes, all we need is a little bit of quiet — to sit on a hilltop at sunset and enjoy the view of nature falling asleep around us. This pack of 25 high-resolution Skies in JPEG and TIFF formats by Sergey Dolya is ideal for photographs that convey a feeling of peace. Most of these Skies were shot in northern latitudes, from Alaska to Greenland, but you’ll also find a sunrise over Kilimanjaro, a sunset over Bagan, and some beautiful clouds from the Maldives.

luminarpresets_cinematicpartii.description_text: The second part of a three-pack series, this cinematic Presets pack is inspired by iconic TV shows of 2022. Want to make your photos look like stills from your favorite scenes? Now it’s easier than ever. Part II contains ten spectacular Templates/Presets for any type of image.

luminarpresets_gracefulcats.description_text: This collection of 10 Presets is designed to bring out the elegance, mystery, and charm of cats. These Presets enhance soft textures, moody lighting, and refined details to create captivating feline portraits.

overlays_colorfulbackgrounds.description_text: Let your imagination run wild with this pack of five background Overlays in different colors and in JPEG format. Use them with Luminar Neo’s Portrait Background Removal feature and create imaginative art. These colorful backgrounds are the perfect start to take your portraits to the next level and add a splash of color to an ordinary photo. Try them out now.

luminarpresets_symmetry.description_text: This collection of 10 stylized Presets is perfect for giving your photos a modern, graphic edge. From low-key contrast to matte tones and subtle color harmonies, these Presets add structure, depth, and visual balance to portraits, architecture, street shots, and more.

luminarpresets_cinematicuniverse.description_text: Want to create photos reminiscent of world-wide famous movies? Dive deep into the whimsical and unique world of Wes Anderson’s cinematography with this collection of 10 Presets inspired by his unique style. A quirky vibe, pastel colors, and symmetry await!

luminarpresets_reinventingyear.description_text: This collection of 10 unique Presets is perfect for achieving striking, experimental looks with a touch of cinematic flair in urban settings. Play with motion, blur, and atmospheric overlays to transform your photos into captivating visual stories.

luminarpresets_megapolis.description_text: This collection of 10 Presets is perfect for photos with indirect light. Enhance any photo taken in the streets of your favorite city, featuring architecture and urban scenes, creating atmospheric compositions with ease.

luts_selfie.description_text: Want to create gorgeous selfies easily? With their growing popularity, capturing unique shots has become a challenging task. That’s why we've come up with 15 LUTs specifically designed for adding unique styles to your selfies. These amazing LUTs will give your photos that perfect Instagram-ready look and make them stand out from the rest. These LUTs are not only gorgeous; they’re also compatible with Luminar 4, Luminar AI, and Luminar Neo as well as Photoshop — and can even be added to your video editing workflow!

skies_cottonskies.description_text: Discover 10 inspiring Skies captured along the coast of the Pacific Northwest. These 10 Skies, available in JPEG format, will add a sense of adventure to your photos with bursts of sunset and sunrise drama. Create amazing, eye-catching travel images in just one click.

luminarpresets_mochamousse.description_text: This collection of 10 Presets is a tribute to Mocha Mousse, the 2025 Pantone Color of the Year. Enhance your photos with refined, warm tones, versatile contrasts, and natural elegance, bringing sophistication to portraits, landscapes, and urban scenes alike.

luts_streetvibelutssollection.description_text: This collection of 10 LUTs for urban photography created by Team Skylum give an amazing toning to your photos, varying from blue to warm tones, from simple ones to heavily stylized. Try a whole new way to edit images.

overlays_surface.description_text: It’s time to experiment with surfaces to create amazing results in your photos. Add a subtle plastic sheet, the texture of a glass door with water drops, a dusty surface, cracks in concrete, and more interesting surfaces to make your images pop thanks to this collection of 10 creative Overlays.

luts_yellowspark.description_text: This radiant collection of LUTs celebrates the vibrancy and cheerfulness of the color yellow. Perfect for any style of photography, these LUTs infuse your images with a range of yellow hues, from vivid to mellow, enhancing the brightness and joy in every shot. Whether you're capturing summer picnics, sunny days at the park, or simply moments of happiness, Yellow Spark LUTs provide an easy way to make your photos shine with warmth and positivity. Transform your photos into bursts of sunshine and capture the essence of joyful moments with just a click.

course_creativephotoeditingtechniquesinl.human_name: Course: Creative Photo Editing Techniques in Luminar Neo
course_creativephotoeditingtechniquesinl.description_text:
Albert Dros is a Dutch landscape photographer who has an extraordinary passion to plan and create unique shots. Volcanoes, solar eclipses and unique aspects of nature draw his attention. He doesn’t just go for the simple shot. “Go big or go home” is his motto, always trying to add some unique element to his shots.

His work has been recognized on a worldwide scale and he has been published worldwide in the biggest media outlets. Albert travels a lot as a photo educator but also for personal projects. But even in The Netherlands, he can’t stop photographing. His inspiration never stops.

skies_pacificcoastline.description_text: Discover 10 inspiring Skies captured along the coast of the Pacific Northwest. These 10 Skies, available in JPEG format, will add a sense of adventure to your photos with bursts of sunset and sunrise drama. Create amazing, eye-catching travel images in just one click.

luminarpresets_neonfusion.description_text: Elevate your night photography to new heights and watch your images come alive with these 10 Presets designed to enhance your neon photography, nightscapes, and photos shot in low-light conditions. Create impressive photos easily.

luminarpresets_cinematicparti.description_text: The first of this three-part cinematic series is inspired by iconic TV shows. Emulate the styles you’ve grown to love on your screen and bring them to your photographic creations. Part one boasts 10 incredible Templates/Presets for any type of image.

luminarpresets_redtones.description_text: Explore this collection of Presets that boasts a variety of shades of red curated specifically for your photos featuring this bold color. Easily enhance your photos and evoke a vibrant, passionate quality, reminiscent of a fiery sunset or a warm, glowing fireplace.

luminarpresets_thelastofthem.human_name: Luminar Presets: The Last of Them
luminarpresets_thelastofthem.description_text: Step into the atmosphere of The Last of Us with this pack of 5 cinematic Presets. Designed to recreate the gritty beauty, dramatic lighting, and emotional depth of the series, these Presets are perfect for landscapes that capture a world in ruins and the people surviving in it.

luminarpresets_orangeandteal.description_text: Don’t you just love teal in your photos? This collection of 10 Presets is perfect for enhancing teals and elevating your images with vibrancy and color. Make your photos look like stills from movies, eye-catching ads, or inviting postcards.

skies_freedomskies.description_text: Immerse yourself in these 10 high-quality JPEG Skies that were captured on a Leica Q2 by members of the Skylum Team in wartime Kyiv. The Skies, taken at sunset and dawn, depict clouds in mesmerizing shapes as well different tones of yellow and blue that bring something unique to the final image. Easily add color and drama to your photos with these exclusive Ukrainian Skies.

luts_citylights.description_text: Turn your night city captures into cinematic masterpieces with the help of this powerful collection. Pick the primary color, apply the LUT, and create a minimal dramatic mood inspired by the popular Cyberpunk look.

luminarpresets_experimentalbandw.description_text: Create elegant, timeless portraits that touch souls with this collection of 10 exquisite Presets. Each one displays a different shade of monochrome, and with built-in Overlays with shadows, grain, and film effects, they are bound to enchant.

overlays_dotsoflightgobos.description_text: Designed to make the most of Luminar Neo’s Studio Light tool, this pack of 5 Overlays will make your images unforgettable. Each Overlay imitates light circles in various colors. Play with these light gobos to create an interesting effect on a portrait, light up a photo in an interesting way, or add something unique to your composition.

luminarpresets_desertplanet.description_text: Inspired by the rich and exotic world of Dune, these Presets are a shortcut to bringing a sense of otherworldly beauty and mystique to your photography. Easily create breathtaking landscapes and portraits that will impress any viewer.

overlays_retroframes.description_text: Give your photos a timeless, cinematic feel with this special pack of 10 film-frame Overlays. Designed in JPEG format for easy use with Luminar Neo’s Layers feature, these Overlays add a nostalgic film-style border to your images. Whether you want a classic 4×5 frame, a stylish collage effect, or a retro film-inspired border, you’ll find the perfect Overlay to enhance your shot. Simply apply, adjust, and create a vintage masterpiece in just a few clicks.

luts_everyday.description_text: Wondering which collection of LUTs will cover all your basic needs? Why not this one? These 10 flexible LUTs were designed by the Skylum Team to meet all your everyday photo editing demands. Whether you want to quickly add a toned style to a recent photoshoot or are looking to experiment, you’ll find the perfect LUT for your goals. Not only are the effects versatile — the LUTs themselves are too! You can use them with Luminar 4, Luminar AI, and Luminar Neo but also with Photoshop — and even in your video editing!

overlays_secretspaces.description_text: Add a touch of mystery to your photo with this pack of five background Overlays in JPEG format of different spaces. Transport your subject to an ancient palace, an underground passage, or a magical realm! Use them with Luminar Neo’s Portrait Background Removal feature and create imaginative art.

luts_tonality.description_text: Choose toning that is bound to make your photos look extraordinary. Create mesmerizing shadowplay with black hues and white accents thanks to these 10 LUTs created by the Skylum Team for your portrait, lifestyle, and urban photos.

overlays_playoflighttextures.description_text: Designed to make the most of Luminar Neo’s Studio Light tool, this pack of 5 Light Textures will make your photos truly impressive. Each Overlay imitates light patterns of different shapes, sizes, intensities, and colors, as if they’re shining through different prisms. Achieve an interesting stylistic effect, elevate your portraits, or simply experiment with these impressive light gobos.

luts_flyhigh.description_text: Ever wanted your drone photos to look spectacular? If you’re photographing outdoors and from up high, these 10 flexible LUTs for photos and videos by the Skylum Team will make your panoramas look fantastic and give your drone photos a breathtaking effect. Vivid, faded, atmospheric, colorful, or toned down, you’ll definitely find a LUT in this collection that will freshen up your panoramas, no matter if they’re shot in nature or in an urban setting.Not only are the effects versatile — the LUTs themselves are too! You can use them with Luminar 4, Luminar AI, and Luminar Neo, but also with Photoshop and Lightroom — and even in your video editing!This collection contains the following LUTs:Nature: A natural LUT with a slight color accentBright: A LUT that adds vividness to the sceneDusk: A slightly faded LUT in cold tones, perfect for evening shotsCozy: A warm LUT with slightly cold shadowsSunset: A soft LUT perfect for sunsetsDaylight: A bright LUT ideal for daylight shotsGloom: A cold, cinematic LUT for cloudy weather Rich: A contrasting LUT with tone correctionNeutral: A low-contrast LUT with slightly modified tonesIcy: A cold LUT with an accent on contrast

luminarpresets_noirmovie.description_text: Immerse yourself in the timeless allure of classic photography with this collection of 10 Presets. This meticulously crafted set of black and white analog film Presets is a homage to the nostalgic elegance of traditional film.

software_luminarneo.description_text:
Luminar Neo is a visionary AI-powered photo editor that redefines creativity with cutting-edge technology. Effortlessly achieve studio-quality results with next-gen tools designed to empower and inspire. Harness the power of GenAI to erase distractions, expand your frame, and explore bold new artistic possibilities. With intuitive features like the object remover and background eraser, transforming your images has never been easier. Unleash your creativity with a RAW editor built for maximum performance and limitless innovation.

Luminar Neo’s GenAI tools bring a revolutionary approach to photo editing, empowering creators with smart, AI-driven enhancements that simplify complex edits while unlocking new creative possibilities. These cutting-edge tools use advanced generative AI to remove distractions, expand image dimensions, and seamlessly replace elements — all with just a few clicks.

luts_bluemood.description_text: Want to infuse your landscapes and cityscapes with a serene and and mysterious mood? This collection of LUTs has a variety of shades of blue that will evoke a tranquil, dreamy feeling, reminiscent of a dusk sky or a deep, endless ocean. Choose the shade that works for you – from intense rich blues tones, to subtle cyan accents that soften the city lights, you’ll definitely find a LUT that works for your photo.

luminarpresets_boldexperiments.description_text: Explore this collection of 10 bold Presets curated for lifestyle, portrait, street and cityscape photography. From film burns to neon textures, each Preset adds a new dimension to your images.

skies_cloudsinparadise.description_text: Looking for a peaceful yet interesting sky for your photos? Look no further. Here are 25 cloudy blue JPEG Skies in 6K resolution by Team Skylum that will help you to easily create stunning, peaceful photos with the perfect atmosphere. This unique collection includes a range of Sky images featuring deep blues and cloudy whites, giving your pictures a romantic yet calming aura. From Skies filled with wispy clouds to those more densely packed, each image has been carefully captured to ensure quality and detail. They’re perfect for landscape photography or adding that special touch to any photo. Try them now!

luminarpresets_playfulpups.description_text: This collection of 10 Presets is perfect for capturing the joyful energy of dogs in motion. These vibrant Presets enhance natural light, bring out warm tones, and make every tail-wagging moment shine.

luts_wowportrait.description_text: Looking for a way to make unforgettable photos with expressive toning? This collection of 10 LUTs for portraits provides you with powerful color effects that will help you bring out the very best in your subjects. Make people pop with color, and add vibrancy and warmth in just a click. Color grading has never been this easy! These LUTs are not only gorgeous; they’re also compatible with Luminar 4, Luminar AI, and Luminar Neo, Photoshop — and even work in most video editing programs!

overlays_analogframes.description_text: Step back in time to an era of classic visual storytelling with this collection of five Frames Overlays, meticulously curated by Team Skylum. Designed to encapsulate the nostalgic charm of old-world film, this pack evokes the timeless quality of analog photography. Each frame offers a unique blend of character, texture, and depth that elevates your modern captures with an authentic vintage touch, allowing you to infuse your shots with the allure of ageless elegance.

luminarpresets_darkroom.description_text: This collection of 10 darkroom-inspired presets infuses your photos with a vintage, nostalgic atmosphere. Perfect for creating moody, retro vibes that evoke the charm of old-fashioned photography.

overlays_experimental.description_text: Feel like adding a touch of something extra to your photos? Discover these 10 Experimental Overlays in JPEG format that you can easily use with Luminar Neo’s Layers feature to transform any photo into a shot that catches the eye. Choose from 10 mesmerizing effects of different colors and shapes, and create a unique mood in a few clicks. From pink hues to golden circles, you’ll certainly find an Overlay perfect for your next masterpiece.

skies_tenderblushingskies.description_text: Explore the glory of the setting sun with these high-quality Skies that channel all the shades of red, orange, pink, and magenta you can think of. Let your imagination run wild thanks to the extraordinary cloud shapes and textures, and create your own photos filled with energy, drama, and the sheer joy of life. This collection includes 25 Skies in JPEG and TIFF formats that will transform your images into digital masterpieces

luminarpresets_neonshapes.description_text: Create futuristic portraits that draw the viewer in with this collection of 10 neon Presets. Each has built-in geometrical and isometric shapes made from neon lights using the Neon & Glow tool in Luminar Neo that will highlight your subjects in a fresh and exciting way.

luminarpresets_cityofshadows.description_text: This collection of 10 moody, cinematic Presets is crafted to transform your urban photography. Enhance shadows, boost contrasts, and add depth for dramatic nighttime scenes or atmospheric cityscapes.

luminarpresets_anseladamstribute.description_text: This collection of 10 Presets, inspired by the iconic work of Ansel Adams, will help you capture the breathtaking beauty and stark contrasts of nature. Each Preset enhances shadows, highlights, and textures, giving your landscapes a timeless, atmospheric feel.

code_org.description_text:
Donations to support Code.org are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Launched in 2013, Code.org® is a non-profit dedicated to expanding participation in computer science by making it available in more schools, and increasing participation by women and underrepresented students of color. Code.org's comprehensive approach represents the vanguard of effective integration of Computer Science (CS) into the core of public school education. Our vision is that every student in every school should have the opportunity to learn computer science. We believe computer science and computer programming should be part of the core curriculum in education, alongside other science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) courses, such as biology, physics, chemistry and algebra.

workflowautomationwithmicrosoftpowerauto.human_name: Workflow Automation with Microsoft Power Automate
workflowautomationwithmicrosoftpowerauto.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn the latest in Power Automate with updated user interface visuals and new technology included
  • Apply practical knowledge like managing user inputs, documents, approvals, and database storage
  • Create flows that integrate with services both inside and outside the Microsoft 365 ecosystem

Who this book is for

This book is excellent for information workers and Power users who are looking to automate repetitive tasks for their organizations or for projects they are undertaking. To make the most of this book you should have some basic exposure to the MS 365 platform.

masteringmicrosoftdynamics365businesscen.description_text:
Key Features

  • Extend Business Central's functionalities through Azure, Power Platform, GitHub, and custom extensions
  • Unlock the potential of data exchange and functionality expansion by integrating with external systems using APIs and OData
  • Build reliable, maintainable, and continuously improving solutions while writing performant, well-structured code and using telemetries and DevOps

Who this book is for

This book is intended for new developers who want to get started with Dynamics 365 Business Central. Professionals with expertise will also benefit from this book by enhancing their knowledge and comprehension of Dynamics 365 Business Central development platform and best practices

technicalprogrammanagershandbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn advanced system design principles and architectural concepts necessary for a TPM
  • Get up to speed with AI-driven project planning, risk management, and stakeholder communication tools
  • Benefit from practical tools, methodologies, case studies, and real-world examples

Who this book is for

This book is designed for aspiring and established Technical Program Managers (TPMs), tech professionals transitioning into TPM roles, and recent graduates embarking on careers in technology consulting. It's also valuable for business analysts, project managers, and anyone supporting or working alongside TPMs. To fully benefit from this book, readers should have a basic understanding of the project management life cycle and be comfortable with technical concepts, as it dives into advanced topics and real-world applications.

unlockingthesecretsofpromptengineering.human_name: Unlocking the Secrets of Prompt Engineering
unlockingthesecretsofpromptengineering.description_text:
Key Features

  • Master prompt engineering techniques to harness AI's writing potential
  • Discover diverse LLM applications for content creation and beyond
  • Learn through practical examples, use cases, and hands-on guidance
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for a wide audience, including writers, marketing and business professionals, researchers, students, tech enthusiasts, and creative individuals. Anyone looking for strategies and examples for using AI co-writing tools like ChatGPT effectively in domains such as content creation, drafting emails, and inspiring artistic works, will find this book especially useful. If you are interested in AI, NLP, and innovative software for personal or professional use, this is the book for you.

activeminds.description_text:
Donations to support Active Minds are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Active Minds is the nation's leading nonprofit promoting mental health for young adults ages 14-24. Their focus is on changing the culture around mental health, by changing the way we talk about, care for, and value mental health in our lives and in our communities. They're best known for their National Chapter Network at high schools and universities, an iconic Send Silence Packing suicide-prevention exhibit, Active Minds Speakers, and their new @Work corporate programs.More details on Active Minds can be found here.

futureoffinancewithchatgptandpowerbi.human_name: The Future of Finance with ChatGPT and Power BI
futureoffinancewithchatgptandpowerbi.description_text:
Key Features

  • Automate Power BI with ChatGPT for quick and competitive financial insights, giving you a strategic edge
  • Make better data-driven decisions with practical examples of financial analysis and reporting
  • Learn the step-by-step integration of ChatGPT, financial analysis, and Power BI for real-world success
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for students, academics, data analysts, and AI enthusiasts eager to leverage ChatGPT for financial analysis and forecasting. It's also suitable for investors, traders, financial pros, business owners, and entrepreneurs interested in analyzing financial data using Power BI. To get started with this book, understanding the fundamentals of finance, investment, trading, and data analysis, along with proficiency in tools like Power BI and Microsoft Excel, is necessary. While prior knowledge of AI and ChatGPT is beneficial, it is not a prerequisite.

chiefaiofficershandbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore practical frameworks for effective AI team building and team management
  • Implement and Optimize AI Agents and Agentic Systems through design and implementation of AI agents.
  • Gain actionable advice for leveraging AI to drive innovation and strategic growth
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for chief AI officers, business leaders, AI and data science professionals, IT managers, entrepreneurs, consultants, academic leaders, policymakers, and general business professionals. This diverse audience seeks to understand not only the technical intricacies of AI, but also how to leverage AI to solve real-world business problems, drive innovation, and achieve strategic goals.

aiproductmanagershandbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Gain insights into AI product discovery, market fit, and execution through structured frameworks.
  • Learn to translate complex AI capabilities into real-world solutions that drive value.
  • Understand ethical AI, bias mitigation, and compliance to build responsible AI products.

Who this book is for

This book is tailored for aspiring and experienced product managers, AI strategists, and business leaders aiming to integrate AI into their products. A foundational understanding of AI is expected and reinforced throughout the book. It is particularly valuable for professionals looking to bridge AI and business strategy, optimize AI/ML applications, and drive data-informed decision-making. Engineers, designers, and executives seeking to align AI capabilities with user needs and market demands will also benefit from the insights and real-world case studies on building scalable AI products.

netsuiteforconsultants.description_text:
Key Features

  • Leverage expert consulting insights to implement and scale NetSuite for diverse business needs

Basic NetSuite knowledge is recommended to get the most out of this guide.

exploringmicrosoftexcelshiddentreasures.description_text:

This clear step-by-step explanation and detailed example workbook will help you to try out new techniques firsthand and leverage them for your business's advantage in no time.

portofshadows.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes a novel of the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

The soldiers of the Black Company don’t ask questions, they get paid. But being “The Lady’s favored” is attracting the wrong kind of attention and has put a target on their backs--and the Company’s historian, Croaker, has the biggest target of all.

The one person who was taken into The Lady’s Tower and returned unchanged has earned the special interest of the court of sorcerers known as The Ten Who Were Taken. Now, he and the company are being asked to seek the aid of their newest member, Mischievous Rain, to break a rebel army. However, Croaker doesn’t trust any of the Taken, especially not ones that look so much like The Lady and her sister…

Chronicles of The Black Company

The Black Company (The First Chronicle)

Shadows Linger (The Second Chronicle)

The White Rose (The Third Chronicle)

The Silver Spike

Shadow Games (The First Book of the South)

Dreams of Steel (The Second Book of the South)

She Is the Darkness (Book Two of Glittering Stone)

Water Sleeps (Book Three of Glittering Stone)

Soldiers Live (Book Four of Glittering Stone)

Lies Weeping (Book One of A Pitiless Rain)

Omnibus editions:

Chronicles of the Black Company

(comprising The Black Company, Shadows Linger, and The White Rose)

The Books of the South

(comprising Shadow Games, Dreams of Steel, and The Silver Spike)

Return of the Black Company

(comprising Bleak Seasons and She Is the Darkness)

The Many Deaths of the Black Company

(comprising Water Sleeps and Soldiers Live)

At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.

toweroffear.description_text:
The City of Qushmarrah is uneasy under the rule of the Herodians —short, balding men whose armies would never have conquered the city had not the great and evil wizard Narkar been killed and sealed in his citadel; had not the savage nomad Datars turned coat and sided with the invaders; had not some traitor opened the fortress to them.

Not many would welcome the return of the old religion, the bloody return of wizardry... but there are some patriots who would accept the return of the devil they know, if it meant the return of independence.

At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.

shadowgames.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the fourth book in the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

After the devastating battle at the Tower of Charm, Croaker leads the greatly diminished Black Company south, in search of the lost Annals. The Annals will be returned to Khatovar, eight thousand miles away, a city that may exist only in legend...the origin of the first Free Companies.

Every step of the way the Company is hounded by shadowy figured and carrion-eating crows. As they march every southward, through bug infested jungle, rivers dense with bloodthirsty pirates, and cities, dead and living, haunted by the passage of the Company north, their numbers grow until they are thousands strong.

But always they are watched--by the Shadowmasters--a deadly new enemy: twisted creature that deal in darkness and death: powerful, shadowy creatures bent on smothering the world in their foul embrace. This is the first round in a deadly game, a game that the Black Company cannot ea hope to win.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

shadowslinger.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the second book in the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

The Black Company stands against the rebels of the White Rose. They are tough men, proud of honoring their contracts. The Lady is evil, but so, too, are those who falsely profess to follow the White Rose, reincarnation of a centuries-dead heroine. Yet now some of the Company have discovered that the mute girl they rescued and sheltered is truly the White Rose reborn.

Now there may be a path to the light, even for such as they. If they can survive it.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

silverspike.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes a novel of the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

A silver spike... embedded in the trunk of the scion of the godtree, it contains the essence of the maddest of the Ten Who Were Taken...The Dominator. Defeated by the Lady and cast from this world, all that was left of him was a foul trace of lingering evil.

But the graveyard that was once the Barrowland contains more secrets than dead. All who would possess the power of the Dominator are drawn to the spike. A foolhardy band of thieves is the first to reach it, and a rapacious and malign spirit is unleashed on an unwary world. The forces gather, sides are drawn, and mortal men can only die as the Dark Lords battle for domination.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

blackcompany.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the first book in the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic fantasy series, with millions of copies in print—following a group of hard-bitten mercenaries waging war on behalf of The Lady, who may be the very infestation of evil itself.

Some feel the Lady, newly risen from centuries in thrall, stands between humankind and evil. Some feel she is evil itself. The hardbitten men of the Black Company take their pay and do what they must, burying their doubts with their dead.

Until the prophesy: The White Rose has been reborn, somewhere, to embody good once more.

There must be a way for the Black Company to find her...

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

bleakseasons.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the first book in the Glittering Stone arc of the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

"Let me tell you who I am, on the chance that these scribblings do survive....I am Murgen, Standard bearer of the Black Company, though I bear the shame of having lost that standard in battle. I am keeping these Annals because Croaker is dead. One-Eye won't, and hardly anyone else can read or write. I will be your guide for however long it takes the Shadowlanders to force our present predicament to its inevitable end..."

So writes Murgen, seasoned veteran of the Black Company. The Company has taken the fortress of Stormgard from the evil Shadowlanders, lords of darkness from the far reaches of the earth. Now the waiting begins.

Exhausted from the siege, beset by sorcery, and vastly outnumbered, the Company have risked their souls as well as their lives to hold their prize. But this is the end of an age, and great forces are at work. The ancient race known as the Nyueng Bao swear that ancient gods are stirring. the Company's commander has gone mad and flirts with the forces of darkness. Only Murgen, touched by a spell that has set his soul adrift in time, begins at last to comprehend the dark design that has made pawns of men and god alike.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

sheisthedarkness.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the second book in the Glittering Stone arc of the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

The wind whines and howls with bitter breath. Lightning snarls and barks. Rage is an animate force upon the plain of glittering stone. Even shadows are afraid. At the heart of the plain stands a vast grey stronghold, unknown, older than any written memory. One ancient tower has collapsed across the fissure. From the heart of the fastness comes a great deep slow breath like that of a slumbering world-heart, cracking the olden silence. Death is eternity. Eternity is stone. Stone is silence. Stone cannot speak but stone remembers. So begins the next movement of Glittering Stone....

The tale again comes to us from the pen of Murgen, Annalist and Standard Bearer of the Black Company, whose developing powers of travel through space and time give him a perspective like no other. Led by the wily commander, Croaker, and the Lady, the Company is working for the Taglian government, but neither the Company nor the Taglians are overflowing with trust for each other. Arrayed against both is a similarly tenuous alliance of sorcerers, including the diabolical Soulcatcher, the psychotic Howler, and a four-year-old child who may be the most powerful of all.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

soldierslive.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the fourth book in the Glittering Stone arc of the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

When sorcerers and demigods go to war, those wars are fought by mercenaries, "dog soldiers," grunts in the trenches. And the stories of those soldiers are the stories of Glen Cook's hugely popular "Black Company" novels. If the Joseph Heller of Catch-22 were to tell the story of The Lord of the Rings, it might read like the Black Company books. There is nothing else in fantasy like them.

Now, at last, Cook brings the "Glittering Stone" cycle within the Black Company series to an end . . . but an end with many other tales left to tell. As Soldiers Live opens, Croaker is military dictator of all the Taglias, and no Black Company member has died in battle for four years. Croaker figures it can't last. He's right.

For, of course, many of the Company's old adversaries are still around. Narayan Singh and his adopted daughter--actually the offspring of Croaker and the Lady--hope to bring about the apocalyptic Year of the Skulls. Other old enemies like Shadowcatcher, Longshadow, and Howler are also ready to do the Company harm. And much of the Company is still recovering from the fifteen years many of them spent in a stasis field.

Then a report arrives of an evil spirit, a forvalaka, that has taken over one of their old enemies. It attacks them at a shadowgate--setting off a chain of events that will bring the Company to the edge of apocalypse and, as usual, several steps beyond.

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

lordofthesilentkingdom.description_text: Following The Tyranny of the Night (Tor hc, June 2005), the second volume of The Instrumentalities of the Night

workinggodsmischief.description_text:
Arnhand, Castauriga, and Navaya lost their kings. The Grail Empire lost its empress. The Church lost its Patriarch, though he lives on as a fugitive. The Night lost Kharoulke the Windwalker, an emperor amongst the most primal and terrible gods. The Night goes on, in dread. The world goes on, in dread. The ice builds and slides southward.

New kings come. A new empress will rule. Another rump polishes the Patriarchal Throne.

But there is something new under the sun. The oldest and fiercest of the Instrumentalities has been destroyed--by a mortal. There is no new Windwalker, nor will there ever be.

The world, battered by savage change, limps toward its destiny. And the ice is coming.

Working God's Mischief is the savage, astounding new novel of The Instrumentalities of Night, by Glen Cook, a modern master of military fantasy.

At the Publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management Software (DRM) applied.

dreamsofsteel.description_text:
From Glen Cook, the godfather of Grimdark, comes the fifth book in the Chronicles of The Black Company—an epic military fantasy series, with millions of copies in print.

Croaker has fallen and, following the Company's disastrous defeat at Dejagore, Lady is one of the few survivors—determined to avenge the Company and herself against the Shadowmasters, no matter what the cost.

But in assembling a new fighting force from the dregs and rabble of Taglios, she finds herself offered help by a mysterious, ancient cult of murder—competent, reliable, and apparently committed to her goals.

Meanwhile, far away, Shadowmasters conspire against one another and the world, weaving dark spells that reach into the heart of Taglios. And in a hidden grove, a familiar figure slowly awakens to find himself the captive of an animated, headless corpse.

Mercilessly cutting through Taglian intrigues, Lady appears to be growing stronger every day. All that disturbs her are the dreams which afflict her by night—dreams of carnage, of destruction, of universal death, unceasing...

“With the Black Company series Glen Cook single-handedly changed the face of fantasy.”—New York Times bestselling author Steven Erikson

callofdutyendowment.description_text:
Donations to support The Call of Duty Endowment are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The Call of Duty Endowment identifies and funds the most efficient and effective organizations that get unemployed veterans back to work.  Our goal is to place 50,000 veterans into high quality jobs by 2019.  For approximately $600, we can fund the placement of one veteran into a good job.  Every dollar donated goes directly to veteran employment programs, as Activision Blizzard covers all of the Endowment’s overhead costs.

chronicon.callout:
95% Positive on Steam

Answer the call of a powerful spirit and return as the ultimate hero to master a new world. (Steam Deck Playable)
chronicon.description_text:
Story
What happens in a world where the last evil lies dead, the last quest is completed, and the last chest has been opened?


In this world, the long-dead Heroes of Old are forever remembered and honored through a great magical device. This device, known only as the Chronicon, is capable of opening a portal into the memories – the very souls – of the Heroes of Old. Each year, a handful men and women are given the great honor to re-live the old tales.
And this year, you have been chosen…

Note: Trailer footage and screenshots are of high level characters with decent equipment. Expect a slower pace at first.

Game Features

  • 5 large and varied acts with each their own storyline to play through
  • 4 unique classes: The Templar, Berserker, Warden, and Warlock
  • Procedurally generated dungeons and areas – each playthrough is different
  • Local co-op up to 4 players (same machine, requires 1 Xbox 360/one controller per additional player)
  • Remote Play Together fully supported
  • Over 400 unique+ items with designed special powers
  • Over 700 items with randomized enchants & qualities, build-changing powers, and powerful set items!
  • Over 900 skills, abilities, and perks to learn and improve
  • Infinite character progression via endless Mastery ranks
  • Hardcore mode
  • Deep crafting - Enchant, Gem, Empower, and inscribe your equipment with Runes!
  • Endgame content including randomized dungeons, bosses, and endgame-only crafting mechanics
  • Full Xbox 360/one controller support (optional)

thelastsoldierofthemingdynasty.human_name: The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty
thelastsoldierofthemingdynasty.callout:
78% Positive on Steam

Defend the honor of the collapsing Ming Dynasty as the last loyal warrior against invading warlords. (Steam Deck Unsupported)
thelastsoldierofthemingdynasty.description_text:
The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty is a 3D action game inspired by traditional Chinese landscape ink paintings.
You take on the role of a Qi army soldier, tasked with fighting back the Japanese pirate raids during the Ming Dynasty. After your unit's boat shipwrecks, you find yourself cast on an island controlled by the Wokou, Japanese pirates that have been terrorizing the Chinese coasts for decades. You are alone with your sword, the last soldier of the Ming Dynasty standing against the pirates – but your duty won't be fulfilled until your people's coasts are safe again.

Explore the beautifully painted landscapes of Fuling Island to defeat the 5 pirate bosses, each with their own unique characteristics, experiencing the most intense traditional melee combat. Embrace the challenge of this hardcore action game, rich in historical charm and martial arts depth!

Fighting against Japanese pirates
The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty is set during the Jiajing period of the Ming Dynasty. At that time, rampant Japanese pirates plagued the southeastern coastal regions. General Qi Jiguang was tasked with combating these pirates; after successfully finishing his campaign, he headed north to Jizhou, pacifying internal rebellions in his path and guarding against external barbarians. But as the Qi's army moved north, the remnants of the defeated Japanese pirates gathered back its forces and conspired with other sea raiders from Fuling Island, readying to make a bloody comeback.

As a member of the Qi's army stationed to guard the coastal regions, specifically tasked with pacifying the seas, you were patrolling the waters when a storm shipwrecked your boat – and you find yourself a castaway on the shores of Ryukyu Island, the only survivor of your unit. With your sword by your side, you walk into the depths of the Island, set on uncovering and dismantling the clandestine plots of the Japanese pirates.

Ink and wash painting world
The game's art is inspired by traditional Chinese ink and wash paintings. From the humblest blade of grass to the most majestic mountains of Fuling Island, each scene is beautifully painted in ink and wash. Its artistic design also draws inspiration from ancient Chinese paintings' character styles and proportions, providing players with a captivating visual experience.

Tactical melee with cold weapons
The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty will put your reflexes and warrior senses to the test. Its combat system is built upon three basic attack actions: stab, cleave, and sweep, which form the basis of both offense and defense. While executing these moves, it is crucial to discern the enemy's attacks simultaneously. You can deflect their attacks by accurately anticipating the enemy's actions. Stay calm in the midst of the storm while you ponder the enemy's every move, and you will remain undefeated in battle.

The game offers a variety of combat styles, ranging from close-quarters melee weapons to long-range bows and arrows. You can either block enemy attacks with your weapons or utilize evading maneuvers and counterattacks. The key to overcoming adversaries lies in swiftly switching between offense and defense, adeptly countering their moves. Only by mastering the art of adaptation and switching styles you will ultimately triumph over your foes.

Historical weaponry and armor
The game offers a variety of weapons and equipment for players to choose from. Each piece of weaponry is meticulously recreated to reflect its origins in real historical contexts.

You can also disarm enemies and utilize their weapon skills against them. Through diligent practice, mastering the techniques of your adversaries, and then applying them to your own weaponry, you will become even more formidable in combat.

dwarvenrealms.callout:
82% Positive on Steam

Lead a party of heroes on a quest to reclaim ancient dwarven kingdoms swallowed by darkness. (Steam Deck Playable)
dwarvenrealms.description_text:
Dwarven Realms is an innovative blend of classic ARPG depth and intense mob-slaying action, offering a fresh take on the genre. Built by a passionate indie team, this action-packed ARPG delivers complex systems inspired by traditional ARPGs, combined with the sheer mob density of rogue-lite survivor games.

Key Features:

  • Deep Customization: Master hundreds of unique skills, abilities, and off-hand options to create your ultimate build. Every character has multiple paths to power, offering endless replayability.

  • High-Intensity Combat: Fight through colossal hordes of enemies, using explosive abilities and strategic positioning to survive overwhelming odds.

  • Epic Loot & Crafting: Find and craft powerful gear, upgrade your weapons, and fine-tune your build to dominate the battlefield.

  • Seasonal Content & Challenges: Join the race for seasonal leaderboards, test your skills in chaotic ruptures, and unlock exclusive rewards.

  • Community-Driven: Our small, dedicated team has been building this game alongside a passionate community. We value player feedback and continuously refine the experience based on it.

With fast-paced gameplay, evolving content, and robust customization, Dwarven Realms is the perfect blend of action and strategy. Whether you're new to ARPGs or a veteran, there's always something new to discover in the ever-expanding Dwarven Realms.

Join us in the ultimate quest for glory and survival!

bloodrayne_terminalcut.callout:
90% Positive on Steam

Engage in visceral, over-the-top combat as the ultimate dhampir anti-heroine. (Steam Deck Playable)
bloodrayne_terminalcut.description_text:
Enhanced and updated for modern systems by the game's original developers, this is the definitive edition of BloodRayne .

In the years between the World Wars, Agent BloodRayne works as a killing machine for The Brimstone Society – a top secret fraternity that hunts down and destroys supernatural threats. Two missions, five years apart, turn out to be connected by one man. For years, this man has been searching the world for powerful occult relics to bring about a new age of domination for the Third Reich. In this frenetic and bloody third-person shooter that unleashed the iconic red-headed femme fatale on the world, the dhampir Rayne faces horrific creatures, hordes of soldiers with an array of tools and firepower, and every Nazi officer that stands between her and the one she must stop.

Features and enhancements of the Terminal Cut edition, created by the game’s original development team:
  • Support for higher display resolutions (up to 4K / 3840x2160).
  • Upscaled cinematic videos
  • Support for modern gamepads (XInput)
  • Improved rendering with up to 4x anti-aliasing
  • Support for higher texture resolutions allowing for use of original, uncompressed textures
  • Improvements to effects such as reflections, water, fog, and shadows

ghostlore.callout:
80% Positive on Steam

Uncover the connection between the modern world and the ancient spirits that haunt it. (Steam Deck Playable)
ghostlore.description_text:
Ghostlore is an 'Eastpunk' Action-RPG where you fight supernatural monsters from Southeast-Asian folklore. Inspired by timeless classic ARPGs such as Diablo 2 and Titan Quest, Ghostlore features detailed item and character customization systems, procedurally generated maps, and awesome authentic 90's retro graphics.

The bloodthirsty Penanggal is a gruesome creature with origins in Malay folklore. It comprises of nothing more than a disembodied head and dangling entrails. The Indonesian Babi Ngepet myth tells of sorcerors who sacrifice their humanity in order to become boar demons. The tales of Hungry Ghosts are superstitions brought over by Chinese immigrants - undead horrors cursed to remain forever hungry due to their greed in mortal life.

Stories from the maritime region of Southeast-Asia are full of all manner of nightmarish, horrifying creatures. Are you brave enough to face them? Discover over 40 different enemies, each with their quirks and tactics to defeat based on their descriptions in folklore.

Explore a procedurally generated world that takes inspiration from the developers' home country of Singapore, its two closest neighbours, Malaysia and Indonesia, and the rest of Southeast Asia.

Players unfamiliar with the region will get to experience a culture that is underrepresented and rarely seen in other forms of media. Players who live in Southeast Asia will find plenty of things they recognize - such as the food! Collect and prepare various meals to boost your stats. Don't fight on an empty stomach!

Ghostlore allows you to mix-and-match abilities from 3 out of 6 character classes to create your own unique hero. The 6 classes are:

  • The Adept: Mystic warriors skilled in Martial Arts, honing their mind as well as their body.
  • The Exorcist: Able to sense the spirit world with ESP and cast out evil spirits.
  • The Feral: Fearless fighters bestowed with the power of blood magic and the ability to transform into a Weretiger.
  • The Geomancer: Masters of the art of bending the elemental forces of Earth, Fire, Ice and Lightning to their will.
  • The Hashashin: Shadowy assassins who rely on speed and stealth to take down opponents.
  • The Sentinel: Keepers of the forest with the ability to communicate with animals.

BUILD YOUR OWN SKILL TREES WITH THE SKILL LINK SYSTEM
Each class comes with a “skill set”, a pool containing active skills, skill modifiers, and passive class bonuses. Skills must be assigned to a grid in order to be usable. More grid spaces unlock as you level up. Things can be placed in or taken out of the grid at will.

Skill modifiers can be used to change the characteristics of any active skill from any class. Skill modifiers link together with active skills both across and down. (see green highlighted area in image). Some skill modifiers have tradeoffs. For example:

Some skill modifiers are trigger modifiers. Trigger modifiers allow a skill to be used automatically, as long as there is enough MP, the skill is not on cooldown, and the modifier’s specified conditions are met. Examples:

COMBO SKILLS
Each active skill is also able to combine with skills from other classes to form an advanced skill that incorporates the characteristics of both base skills.

Combo skills are created when two compatible skills are placed adjacent to one another in the skill grid.

The Glyph system is where Ghostlore brings something truly new to the Action-RPG table. In your travels you will find Glyphs - magical symbols that you can inscribe onto your body to gain new powers.

The glyphs are based on the Toki Pona language, designed by Sonja Lang.

Each Glyph takes up space on your body (represented in game as a grid). As your level increases, so do the number of glyphs you can inscribe onto yourself.

Here's where things get interesting: Compound glyphs are rare and special glyphs that use 5 normal glyph spaces, but grant additional bonuses to glyphs that are placed within their configuration. Plan your Compound Glyph layout in order to maximise stat bonuses!

In Ghostlore, you can wield a variety of weapons prevalent in Southeast-Asian martial arts:
  • The Kris or Keris - a blade with a distinctively wavy shape. It is a well-balanced weapon.
  • The Bow and Arrow has been a staple of hunting since the dawn of time; apparently they come in handy with ghost-hunting as well!
  • Parangs, also known as machetes, are cleaving blades with a wide arc.
  • The deadly Kukri knives are the fastest attacking melee weapons in the game.
  • The trusty Spear has the longest reach out of all the melee weapons.
  • Finally, there are enchanted Talismans that can fly and give foes nasty papercuts.

In addition, you can find and equip a variety of Amulets. Amulets are commonly sold in many parts of real world Southeast Asia as good luck charms. In the world of Ghostlore, their power is very, very real. Equipping the right Amulet for the situation can mean the difference between a glorious victory and an untimely demise.

Additionally, items can be modified in a couple of unique ways:

Spirits inhabiting items are the reason why some of them have magical properties. Visit the Psychic to awaken the spirits which lay dormant in items such as weapons, shields, hats, scarves and amulets. Once awakened, the spirit will ask you to settle a score. Upon fulfilment of the request, your item will strengthen with new enchantments.

In Southeast Asian folklore, the Orang Bunian are nature spirits that you can meet in your travels. On rare occasion, they will bless your items with new, random properties.

  • Local co-op multiplier lets you play with up to 4 of your friends on the same screen.
  • Steam workshop support allows you to customise your experience with mods from the community.
  • The Shrine of Balance is an optional asynchronous multiplayer feature which lets you help other players by sending them equipment. You have better chances of good loot in return when they use your equipment.
  • The Shrine of Spirits is another optional asynchronous online multiplayer mechanic where a 'snapshot' of another player's current character (also known as their 'Ghost Data') can be temporarily summoned into the your own game as an ally NPC.

Mission Mode: Undertake randomized missions after completing the campaign.

Unlock Map Data, which allows you to modify missions and change the odds more to your favour.

See how far you can go in the Hell Gate Island's Endless Mode

bcrf.description_text:
Donations to support BCRF are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by funding the most promising medical research worldwide. By investing 91 cents of every dollar to our mission, BCRF stands today as the largest and most highly rated global funder of breast cancer research.

blossomtalesii_theminotaurprince.human_name: Blossom Tales II: The Minotaur Prince
blossomtalesii_theminotaurprince.callout:
89% Positive on Steam

Embark on an epic quest to save your sibling from a monstrous Minotaur Prince. (Steam Deck Verified)
blossomtalesii_theminotaurprince.description_text:
The Minotaur King has returned...and it's all your fault! Lily's back for a new "classic" action-adventure set hundreds of years after The Sleeping King!

Grandpa's latest tale takes you on a journey through haunted forests, pirate shores, and other mysterious lands across a vast open-world! Charming towns, terrible enemies, tricky puzzles, and powerful weapons await you.

Enjoy a "story within a story" as Grandpa narrates exciting moments throughout Lily's incredible adventure.

Will you help Lily defeat the Minotaur King and save her brother?

Features
  • Compelling main story plus engaging side-quests
  • Classic top-down action-adventure in a retro 2d environment
  • Dozens of mini-dungeons, caves, and locations to discover
  • Choices that influence story and events
  • A wide array of weapons and abilities
  • 15+ hours of gameplay

intothenecrovale.callout:
86% Positive on Steam

Descend into the chaotic, monster-filled Necrovale, a cursed underworld where every floor holds untapped, forbidden power. (Steam Deck Playable)
intothenecrovale.description_text:
Your fate hangs in the balance as The Stranger, a condemned criminal chosen by the All-Father himself. Preserve this tired world or destroy it, and the choice is yours.

The hopeless, the lost, the drowned and forgotten, all must obey one rule: fight to survive. Generations of unwanted criminals and degenerates lurk in the dark corners of the Necrovale.

The Necrovale is filled with powerful relics left behind by those whose story ended in the depths. Collect these weapons, armor, shields, staffs, jewelry, totems, hats, books, and other tchotchkes as you follow in their footsteps.

Along your journey, you will meet other prisoners. The crimes and failures that brought them to the Necrovale are their own business. Reserve your judgement, however, as you might find yourself depending on these strange and broken creatures to survive.

Donations to support BCRF are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The mission of the Breast Cancer Research Foundation is to prevent and cure breast cancer by funding the most promising medical research worldwide. By investing 91 cents of every dollar to our mission, BCRF stands today as the largest and most highly rated global funder of breast cancer research.

from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Chronicon, Ghostlore, Dwarven Realms, Dungeons of Sundaria, BloodRayne: Terminal Cut, The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Ready to get your blood pumping? Sharpen your blades, steady your hands, and dive into the Close Combat Collection! Unleash stylish, aggressive combat in Dwarven Realms, the ultimate action RPG. Battle for survival in The Last Soldier of the Ming Dynasty, a grand adventure inspired by breathtaking traditional Chinese ink-painting landscapes. Try these great games and more including Ghostlore!  Get up close and personal with this exhilarating bundle—and help support the Breast Cancer Research Foundation with your purchase.

werewolftheapocalypserpg_5theditioncorer.human_name: Werewolf The Apocalypse RPG: 5th Edition Core Rulebook
werewolftheapocalypserpg_5theditioncorer.description_text: As a new generation Garou, you will confront the forces of destruction, avarice, and greed ravaging the earth-mother. Utilize the 5th edition Storyteller system to create your chronicles within the World of Darkness. Includes everything you need to know to build your own character or guide a troupe as they explore their new forms. As a werewolf, build your legend, vie for renown, and fight to take back what has been lost. Join one of eleven tribes, each unique and rich with narrative depth for players to explore, and Storytellers to utilize. This 300+ page PDF also includes an introductory story to guide new Werewolf players and veteran World of Darkness enthusiasts through their first game.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_sabbattheblackh.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - Sabbat The Black Hand Sourcebook
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_sabbattheblackh.description_text: Sabbat: The Black Hand is a supplement for the Vampire: The Masquerade Roleplaying Game, outlining in detail the lore and background of the Sabbat, including new Paths and Disciplines, histories, and new Storyteller resources for a richer roleplaying experience.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_falloflondonchr.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - Fall of London Chronicle
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_falloflondonchr.description_text: The Fall of London is a Chronicle set in London in 2012, exploring the events that led to the canonical destruction of the city’s Kindred by the Second Inquisition. It is centered around a group of members of the Cult of Mithras who are awakened during the turmoil to retrieve five ancient relics of the Kindred god-ruler of Britain.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_playersguide_ph.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - Player's Guide
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_playersguide_ph.description_text: This book collects new character-building options, powers, guides for playing together and alone and virtually, and new ways to use the old rules of Vampire: The Masquerade. The Players Guide is the perfect companion to the core Vampire: The Masquerade rulebook!

hunterthereckoningrpg_linesdrawninbloodc.human_name: Hunter The Reckoning RPG: Lines Drawn in Blood Chronicle Book
hunterthereckoningrpg_linesdrawninbloodc.description_text: What lines are you willing to cross when you push back against the evil that walks among us? Lines Drawn in Blood presents a series of four stories that can be played individually or linked together to tell an entire chronicle.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_blood-stainedlo.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - Blood-Stained Love Sourcebook
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_blood-stainedlo.description_text: Expand your game of personal and political horror to include wide-eyed lovers and manipulative monsters. The book is for Storytellers and players alike, giving you tools, techniques and advice on how to bring romance to the undead. This book includes 6 six fleshed out storytelling characters and six detailed story concepts, all designed to maximize romance potential.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_secondinquisiti.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - Second Inquisition
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_secondinquisiti.description_text: The Crimson Gutter provides a starter chronicle, designed to help novice or experienced Storytellers run any introductory game of Vampire: The Masquerade. The Crimson Gutter chronicle introduces core concepts during play such as feeding, the sects (Anarchs, Camarilla), and the Masquerade itself while giving the players' characters a chance to carve a niche for themselves among the Kindred.

vampirethemasquerade_rpg_thecrimsongutte.human_name: Vampire The Masquerade: RPG - The Crimson Gutter Chronicle Book
vampirethemasquerade_rpg_thecrimsongutte.description_text: The Crimson Gutter provides a starter chronicle, designed to help novice or experienced Storytellers run any introductory game of Vampire: The Masquerade. The Crimson Gutter chronicle introduces core concepts during play such as feeding, the sects (Anarchs, Camarilla), and the Masquerade itself while giving the players' characters a chance to carve a niche for themselves among the Kindred.
